name: Barbarians
description:
You wake up in a strange place, with only 100 coins and a card slot machine in front of you.

You put your last coins in the machine and roll i t!

You now have a fighter to control and fight many enemies from Frostjold!

Now you are addicted, and want to win more and more coins defeating stronger, and stronger enemies to roll again the slot machine, injecting more and more coins in it, with hope to get a more powerfull warrior!

Thats the essence of Barbarians!

Have fun and leave your comments, i am eager to accept new good suggestions to implement and please report any bugs to i fix!

Discord Group: https://discord.gg/MNqkAYF
